goals__remit: IFIEC Europe represents the interests of those industrial sectors for which energy is a significant component of production costs. IFIEC Europe's mission is to anticipate and to respond to the evolving requirements of those sectors by proposing policies that allow realistically priced energy to be available. This will allow them to continue to improve energy efficiency and environmental performance whilst ensuring international competitiveness both in Europe and throughout the world.
